text.p: These are the leading stories in the Moroccan press on Wednesday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Egyptian President Mubarak arrives in Morocco to co-host joint high commission with King Hassan; meeting to focus on Middle East situation and ways of enhancing cooperation.
- Crown Prince Mohamed's visit to Spain seen as step towards consolidating relations.
- Prime Minister Filali presides over board meeting of state-owned railway utility.
- Fisheries Ministry and European Commission to hold two-day meeting on fish industry starting on May 26.
- Huge fire in textile factory in northern city of Tangier causes heavy damage.
- King tells French magazine Geopolitique social imbalance and rural depopulation hamper development.
- China's visiting state councillor Song Gian meets Moroccan officials over energy, mining and fisheries cooperation.
